attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: would it not be better to scrap all cars over 20 years old or when drivers are banned they are banned for life?. people will lose jobs because if you live 20 miles away from your job it will cost you over £40 a day to go to work.so familys will suffer and more people will be on the dole and the poorer will get poorer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
